RelatedSentence: In a strong reaction issued unusually promptly , barely an hour after the U.S. announcement , the Foreign Ministry here accused the U.S. of making the indictment based on fabricated facts , adding that the move grossly violates the basic norms governing international relations and jeopardises China - U.S .
